Result.Abstract: We present a randomized linear-time algorithm to find a minimum spanning tree in a connected graph with edge weights. The algorithm uses random sampling in combination with a recently discovered linear-time algorithm for verifying a minimum spanning tree. Result.Abstract: A rotation in a binary tree is a local restructuring of the tree that changes it into another tree.
